title: Mini-Ep 181: Universally Endorsed By All
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 181: Universally Endorsed By All
itunes:subtitle: Kate falls for another Instagram ad preying on her desire for long 80’s-style nails, and Doree needs a great sporty sunscreen recc. Then, listeners ask for drugstore beauty reccs available in Canada, question budgeting for wellness, and remind us that ...
description:
Kate falls for another Instagram ad preying on her desire for long 80’s-style nails, and Doree needs a great sporty sunscreen recc. Then, listeners ask for drugstore beauty reccs available in Canada, question budgeting for wellness, and remind us that there is no one-size-fits-all for relationships.


Activity of the week: Free yourself of uncomfortable things. 


To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.

Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.

Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums).


This week’s episode is sponsored by:

JENNI KAYNE - Get 15% off your first order at jennikayne.com when you use code FOREVER35 at checkout.

 

RITUAL - For 10% off during your first three months visit ritual.com/FOREVER35. 

 

FLEXFIT - Visit Flexfits.com/forever35 and use code FOREVER35 for  20% off Flex Disc Starter Kits or 10% off your first Flex Cup
